DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy 13-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine prevention first episode vaccine-type pneumococcal community-acquired pneumonia adult .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effiacy 13-Valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine ( 13vPnC ) Adults
DOC.criteria: Male female adult age 65 year old day vaccination able fulfill study requirement . Previous vaccination license experimental pneumococcal vaccine Residence nursing home , longterm care facility , similar facility Known hypersensitivity vaccination Immune deficiency suppression
